Bojan is an experienced developer with a healthy interest in new takes on old problems, from programming paradigms (like functional-reactive), to innovative approaches to API design (like GraphQL). He's one of the most active members of the GraphQL/Java community, an RPG nerd, a newbie alchemist, and a wannabe traveler.
